main event: Reported sighting of 3 or 4 unknown objects in the sky over a distance of 10-15 miles, which were visible for several minutes and moved in an approximately straight path.
interesting points: The objects appeared dark in color and had no visible lights.
The objects were observed by multiple witnesses, including 12 Chicago airport employees.
The objects seemed to have the ability to abruptly stop and change direction.
The observer compared the size of the object to that of a dime, indicating it was relatively small.
The objects were observed in clear weather conditions with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: 3 or 4 dark, unidentified objects in the sky
